transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello. Ji mai IndiaMART se baat kar rahi thi mam. Kaisi hain aap?
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Mam actually abhi aapka Sameer ka ek discussion hua tha na services ke regarding?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Abhi aap satisfy hai Sameer ke discussion se?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Okay, aapka exact issue kya tha mam?
Customer: Mera issue tha buyleads ka. Aur mujhe bulk leads chahiye the. Matlab jo hum bulk quantity mein leads karte hai toh mujhe retail quantity ke lead aa rahi thi.
Executive: Achha achha, abhi toh mam usne aapko changes vgera kar diye honge and I hope aapko bhi proper guide kar diya hoga exact kya challenge aa raha tha, right? Toh mam abhi aapka mai concern close kar rahi hu and you will get the feedback message on your mail. So please we are requesting you give a positive feedback to him mam, okay?
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Thank you so much mam, have a nice day mam. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needed bulk buyleads instead of retail.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed changes were made.

- Requested positive feedback for Sameer.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, feedback, resolution
